description: This Dart file defines the NotesProvider class, which manages the state and operations related to notes in a Flutter application. It handles fetching, updating, creating, deleting, and filtering notes, and notifies listeners about state changes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages the state of notes, including fetching, searching, layout toggle, and CRUD operations.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider by fetching all notes if not already initialized.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches all notes from the repository and updates the internal list.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query string and notifies listeners.

methods.name: toggleLayout
methods.description: Toggles between grid and list view layouts.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with the given title and content, then refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note by ID with new title and content, then refreshes.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID and refreshes.

methods.name: togglePinned
methods.description: Toggles the pinned status of a note.
